text:
But Republicans want to throw them in private prisons or kill them off!!!

This has been their answer to the mentally ill homeless population.

#Republicansaretheproblem
Former military intelligence officer seemingly subscribes to oft-debunked view that Seattle's homeless population primarily came from elsewhere
